biography_text: HAGEDORN, Jim, (son of Thomas Michael Hagedorn), a Representative from Minnesota; born in Blue Earth, Faribault County, Minn., August 4, 1962; graduated from Langley High School, McLean, Va.; B.A., George Mason University, Fairfax, Va., 1983; staff, United States Representative Arlan Ingehart Stangeland of Minnesota, 1984-1991; staff, United States Treasury Department, 1991-1998; businessman; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014, and One Hundred Fifteenth Congress in 2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
